item.description:
Let's meetup at Ryles Jazz Club to see and hear a terrific performer, Diane Blue.  In just a few short years, Diane has established a reputation as an incredibly soulful, gutsy singer who can also throwdown on the blues harp.  Last year she was voted Outstanding Female Singer in the Blues Audience Newletter readers poll and she competed in the 2011 International Blues Challenge in Memphis.

Diane has also toured extensively internationally but this is her home and Ryles is a great venue for her June show with her BIG BAND.  Ryles has a good sized dance floor, too, so when Diane makes you feel like moving, you'll have room to do it.

Please check out Diane's music at the ReverbNation page; you can also read about Diane on her website.

Notes:

  • The cover charge is $10.

  • Follow Ryles' link to get advance tickets.  (Diane usually gets a very good crowd at Ryles so a sellout is likely.)

  • Dinner starts at 5 p.m.

    If you'd like to arrive early and have a bite to eat, call Ryles for information.  (See graphic below.)
  • I'll be there at about 8:30 p.m.

    I'll be at the bar and as noted above, I'll also email my cell # to all Yes and Maybe RSVPers on the afternoon of the show.

  • This is a joint meetup with the Cambridge-Somerville Live Music meetup group.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my profile picture. I'll be hanging at the bar and I'll also email my cell # to all Yes and Maybe RSVPers on the afternoon of the show.
item.name: Diane Blue BIG BAND @ Ryles
